basics.summary: As a backend developer, I have been involved in the development of microservices from conception to production release. I specialize in the design and development of scalable APIs, database management, and system integration using message brokers. I am experienced in researching and evaluating new technologies and tools to optimize system performance and efficiency. I am committed to continue learning and applying the latest technologies and best practices in software development to deliver high quality solutions to end users.
